forum.name: Value and limitations of OER in math instruction
forum.intro:
Now that we have discussed how OER might be integrated into instruction, we will look at one OER that was reviewed by adult educators and used in adult education math classes.

Go to: Arithmetic Workout - https://www.oercommons.org/courses/arithmetic-workout

Click “Run Now!” to open the activity. Experiment with the options for the activity (in the right panel).

Read the comments about this OER posted by other adult education math teachers.

Then on the discussion board, post your comments regarding the following statements on the discussion board:

  1. Which mathematical practices might be supported through the use of this OER? (You may find it convenient to look at the Mathematical Practices Checklist.)
  2. What content, skills, or understandings would learners develop as they use this OER?
  3. What challenges would you foresee if you were to use this OER in your own class?
